meanings.definition: A person who rejects or refuses to accept something.
meanings.sent1: The repudiator refused to sign the contract.
meanings.sent2: The repudiator disagreed with the decision and walked away.
meanings.sent3: The repudiator at the party declined all offers of food.
meanings.sent4: Her cat was a repudiator of any new toys she brought home.
meanings.sent5: The repudiator's stubbornness made negotiations difficult.
